answers.answer: Just check the heartbeat and is the pregnancy going good or r u having braxton hicks
Is there a vaginal exam at all?

At mines it was the usual baby heartbeat and my blood pressure , and i didn't have a vaginal exam i don't think you get another one until the end either this visit or next one they will check for diabetes
My doctor said he was just gonna check the heartbeat and stuff like that. Then in a week or two, get the diabetes test thing.
Did any of you have a vaginal exam at the 20 week appointment then? Cause she said she was gonna do one then but she didn't so I thought maybe I'd get one tomorrow.
I only got a vaginal exam at 11 weeks. Everything after that has just been blood pressure, heartbeat and occasional blood tests.
Yeah I got one at 12 weeks.. I wonder if that's it?

question: I have my 24 week appointment tomorrow. What should I expect?
title: 24 week appointment?
